com.flowpowered.commons

Class ViewFrustum

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.flowpowered.commons.ViewFrustum

  • public class ViewFrustum
extends Object
    A view frustum defined by the camera view and projection. Used to check for intersection with object to determine whether or not they're visible.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      ViewFrustum()

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(com.flowpowered.math.matrix.Matrix4f projection,
                   com.flowpowered.math.matrix.Matrix4f view)
        Updates the frustum to match the view and projection matrix.
        Parameters:
        projection - The projection matrix
        view - The view matrix

      • getVertices

        public com.flowpowered.math.vector.Vector3f[] getVertices()
        Returns a new array containing the vertices of the frustum. They are in the following order, given by the intersection of the planes:
        RIGHT - TOP - NEAR
        RIGHT - TOP - FAR
        RIGHT - BOTTOM - NEAR
        RIGHT - BOTTOM - FAR
        LEFT - TOP - NEAR
        LEFT - TOP - FAR
        LEFT - BOTTOM - NEAR
        LEFT - BOTTOM - FAR
        Returns:
        An array containing the frustum vertices

      • getPosition

        public com.flowpowered.math.vector.Vector3f getPosition()
        Returns the position of the frustum.
        Returns:
        The frustum position

      • getNearPlane

        public float getNearPlane()
        Returns the near plane distance of the frustum.
        Returns:
        The near plane

      • getFarPlane

        public float getFarPlane()
        Returns the far plane distance of the frustum.
        Returns:
        The far plane

      • intersectsCuboid

        public boolean intersectsCuboid(com.flowpowered.math.vector.Vector3f[] vertices,
                                com.flowpowered.math.vector.Vector3f position)
        Checks if the frustum of this camera intersects the given cuboid vertices.
        Parameters:
        vertices - The cuboid local vertices to check the frustum against
        position - The position of the cuboid
        Returns:
        Whether or not the frustum intersects the cuboid

      • intersectsCuboid

        public boolean intersectsCuboid(com.flowpowered.math.vector.Vector3f[] vertices,
                                float x,
                                float y,
                                float z)
        Checks if the frustum of this camera intersects the given cuboid vertices.
        Parameters:
        vertices - The cuboid local vertices to check the frustum against
        x - The x coordinate of the cuboid position
        y - The y coordinate of the cuboid position
        z - The z coordinate of the cuboid position
        Returns:
        Whether or not the frustum intersects the cuboid

      • contains

        public boolean contains(com.flowpowered.math.vector.Vector3f point)
        Checks if the frustum contains the given point.
        Parameters:
        point - The point to check if the frustum contains
        Returns:
        True if the frustum contains the point

      • contains

        public boolean contains(float x,
                        float y,
                        float z)
        Checks if the frustum contains the given point.
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate of the point
        y - The y coordinate of the point
        z - The z coordinate of the point
        Returns:
        True if the frustum contains the point
